name: education-toolkit
description: Comprehensive toolkit for course developers with 13 specialized agents and 10 slash commands. Includes strategic course outline creation (CLOs, weekly structure, MLOs, assessment strategy), peer design review simulation, PAIRR (Peer and AI Review + Reflection), AI Roleplay exercises, diagnostic rubrics, accessibility auditing, widget testing, course QA, and enhanced storyboard validation. Bundled with course design knowledge base: Ivey 6-phase development process, cohort/self-paced learning models, course outline examples, concept threading guide, and 464 KB of frameworks and AI assessment research.
